summary: This mod adds a new stand-alone, lore-friendly, light armor for all races and both genders.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/6356/descah.png[/img]
\"Battlemage armor\" a new stand-alone, lore-friendly, light armor for all races and both genders. You can craft it in leather section at any forge or find it, with treasure map IV. Armor set includes Hood, Boots, Gloves and Robe. It have similiar stats to scaled armor.

[img]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/6190/61270085.png[/img]
[b]1.0B[/b] - Release.
[b]1.1B[/b] - Fix some clipping issues, normal iron helmet.
[b]1.2B[/b](current) - New boots model, armor is upgradeable now.

It`s beta-version, so if you have any bugs add comments and pictures!

[img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/2806/insts.png[/img]
Open archive and copy files to your Skyrim Data folder.

[img]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/6900/88908441.png[/img]
Legs clipping issue.

[img]http://img862.imageshack.us/img862/5466/83074192.png[/img]
Add enchantments, color variants(six styles), new boots.

[img]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/2989/cit.png[/img]
Betheseda for Skyrim, it`s assets and HRTP.
Niftools team for Nifscope.
author: Sword13
